message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200, which reflects its true value.

Alice, your offer is way too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is simply out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $80 for it, which is the most I can afford right now.  Let me know if that's something we can work with.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 is my initial asking price, I understand your budget constraints.  How about we meet halfway at $140?  It's a fantastic deal for a product of this quality.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $140 is still outside my budget. I'm prepared to pay $90. This is a fair price considering I'm willing to buy it right now. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to take my business elsewhere.
